title: IELTS Listening Part 3: Research Discussion
text: Listen to the student and his tutor discussing the dissertation.

questions.prompt: Why did James decide against the topic 'History of Transportation'?
questions.explanation: James says: 'I realized it's **too broad**'. Dr. Miller agrees.

questions.prompt: Which topic do they finally agree on?
questions.explanation: Dr. Miller suggests steam engines, but James says 'I'd prefer to look at **bicycles**' and the tutor agrees: 'Yes, letâ€™s go with bicycles'.

questions.prompt: What will be James's main source of research?
questions.explanation: James states: 'I was planning to rely mostly on **newspaper archives**'.

questions.prompt: What is the new deadline for the assignment?
questions.explanation: Dr. Miller says: 'I can grant you an extra three days. So you can hand it in on the **18th**'.

questions.prompt: What specific formatting requirement does the tutor mention?
questions.explanation: Dr. Miller warns: 'make sure your **bibliography** follows the new university style guide'.
